page.title: 16LEISURE IN NORTH YATE
page.content: We surveyed the people of North Yate. We asked them all if they played a sport regularly and just under half of them did, and about half of them go to watch sport regularly. We asked them how many went to the cinema and about one third went regularly, one third hardly ever go, and one third never go. We asked them all if they owned videos and two thirds of them did, but less than one third owned computers. We asked them all the amount of time they watched television and the average was two and a half hours each day. We asked people if they think there is enough sport in North Yate. Most think there is not enough but a few think there is. We asked all of them if they went on holiday regularly; the vast majority said yes. A quarter go abroad.
